titles.title: Remote Worker Relief Act of 2020
Remote Worker Relief Act of 2020

To establish rules for States or other taxing jurisdictions to tax businesses and individuals during COVID-19 while employees are performing employment duties in other States or taxing jurisdictions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Remote Worker Relief Act of 2020
This bill establishes rules for the taxation of wages of individual taxpayers who work remotely to comply with COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) requirements and for the taxation of the businesses for whom such taxpayers work.
